# Immaculaterr

Immaculaterr is a Plex “autopilot” that watches what you’re watching, generates curated recommendation collections, and can optionally send missing titles to Radarr/Sonarr.

## Docs

- Main README: `../doc/README.md`
- Setup guide: `../doc/setupguide.md`
- FAQ: `../doc/FAQ.md`
- Security policy: `../doc/security.md`
- Version history: `../doc/Version_History.md`
